ID.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

LedgerCode.description: A code which indicates which company journal the Purchase Order is assigned to. Use GET /purchase order/localizeddata to translate the code into text.

Name.description: A name for the purchase order.

NeededByDate.description: The date by which the purchase order must be fulfilled. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

OrderDate.description: The date when goods were ordered. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

PaymentTerms.description: The net payment terms that have been set up with a vendor.

PolicyExternalID.description: The external identifier of the policy that should be associated with the purchase order. The external ID is a property of the policy in its configuration.

RequestedBy.description:
The person that requests the goods associated to the purchase order.
            	If the setting "Assign invoice to Purchase Request Owner" is turned on, our system will read this value
            	to identify a valid invoice owner.
            	This value will be matched against the following Employee fields in the order given:
                1. Employee Login ID
                2. Employee ID
                3. Employee Email Address
                4. Employee Name ("first_name last_name" or "last_name, first_name")

RequestedDeliveryDate.description: The date the purchase order instructed the vendor to deliver the goods. Format YYYY-MM-DD

Shipping.description: The total shipping cost for the purchase order.

ShippingDescription.description: A description of how the goods in the purchase order will ship. For example, via FedEx.

ShippingMethodKey.description: A code that represents the shipping method used by the vendor. Maximum length: 10 characters

ShippingTermsKey.description: A code that represents the shipping terms that the vendor offers. Maximum length: 10 characters

Status.description: The current status of the purchase order.

Tax.description: The total tax for the purchase order.

VendorAddressCode.description: The code that identifies the vendor's remit address for the purchase order.

ReceivedQuantity.description: The number of items that were received.

UnitOfMeasureCode.description: Unit of measure code for a purchase order line item receipt.

ErrorCode.description: A code that indicates why the purchase order was not processed successfully.

FieldCode.description: A code that indicates which field caused an issue. This code typically appears only when a field is being validated against a field of a form type. Format: LEVEL|CODE. The possible levels are: Header, ShipTo, BillTo, LineItem, Allocation. See Purchase Order Responses and Errors for more information.

LineItemExternalID.description: The external ID of a line item that caused an error. If the error is related to an allocation, this field indicates the external ID of the line item that the allocation is associated with, and also indicates the allocation that caused of the error. See Purchase Order Responses and Errors for more information.

Message.description: The external ID of a line item that caused an error. If the error is related to an allocation, this field indicates the external ID of the line item that the allocation is associated with, and also indicates the allocation that caused of the error. See Purchase Order Responses and Errors for more information.

Status.description: The result of processing the purchase order. Format: SUCCESS or FAILURE
